content.rendered:
What is Ontology

Ontology is a project founded by OnChain company in 2017. Ontology provides public blockchains that include a series of complete distributed ledgers and smart contract systems. Ontology provides its native token called ONT.


Ontology Wallet

Manage your crypto wisely! Learn how to setup Atomic Wallet to send, receive, exchange, and buy cryptocurrency.
